name: totem
description: AI-native, git-native, distributed project management platform - open source and self-hosted

scripts.start: npm run build:scripts && NODE_ENV=production node dist/server-nestjs.js
scripts.start:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:scripts && NODE_ENV=production node dist/server-nestjs.js
scripts.dev:backend: NODE_ENV=development PORT=8080 nodemon --ext ts,js,json --exec "ts-node --project tsconfig.scripts.json scripts/server-nestjs.ts"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:scripts && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.env:setup: cp .env.example .env && echo 'Environment file created. Edit .env to customize settings.'
scripts.env:check: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); console.log('Environment variables loaded successfully'); console.log('PORT:', process.env.PORT); console.log('NODE_ENV:', process.env.NODE_ENV);"

author: hi
